title: Gorgeous Move in mid August close to Boeing FREE storage/parking GREAT
posting_body: 1 year lease, new paint/carpet showing today at 8:15am, will rent fast; text
show contact info
for appointment to view.
Please see criteria and confirm you are qualified.
Criteria, pictures and application can be found at <URL>
Large 2-bedroom 1-bath Northern View Apartments looks like condos at 717 Hawthorne Street just above E Marine View Drive in North Everett.
Electric and Renters insurance needed before move in.
Super spacious about 850 square fee, watch eagles and hawks soar over the river.
Includes a full size washer and  dryer, separate storage area, (1) assigned parking spot and water/sewer/garbage $50.00 each (all ages)
We are a small community with great residents!
All our applicants are screened for credit and criminal history.
We have the best onsite manager and maintenance that provides routine maintenance.
Landscaping is handled by an outside vendor on a bi-weekly basis, very noticeable.
We pride ourselves in providing good comfortable housing at an affordable price.

We are also close to Bus stops, Boeing, Everett Community college, naval station, casinos, parks, beach and many medical facilities as well as The Legion Golf Course and Legion Park is just 2 minutes away with a great playground with ocean view also enjoy Everett Marina and waterfront is minutes away; and the Everett Waterfront offers Everett's finest dining (Anthony's, Woodfire Grill and Lombardi's).
The waterfront has great walking/jogging/Skating paths, a beautiful marina, fishing pier, boat charters plus a fabulous wholesome weekly Farmers Market!
W/G/S $50.00 each/all ages
Deposit: $500
$500.00 Pet deposit 1/2 refundable $45.00 per month pet rent Max 2
Application: $45/person (anyone over the age of 18 needs to apply and be on the lease)
We do accept pets at management discretion, email for criteria please show renters insurance.

So many fun things to do: Imagine Children's Museum to Comcast Community Ice Rink, the Everett area offers 98 different types of family activities, including: Parks, Bowling, Movie Theaters and Theaters.
Thank you for your time, I look forward to showing you around!
